category_b.title: Master the Road with Category B!
category_b.subtitle: Welcome to Viktorija Driving School N√µmme! Ready to get your driver's license? Our driving school offers professional training for categories A (motorcycle) and B (passenger car) for over 15 years. Our unique guarantee: a driver's license in 4-5 weeks or we'll give you your money back!

exam_prep.title: üö¶ PREPARATION FOR THE DMV EXAM
exam_prep.subtitle: The DMV exam is like a blind date: you never know how it will end.
exam_prep.main_text: But with us, you'll definitely have a second date! We'll prepare you so well that the inspector will doubt their own authority.
exam_prep.main_text_continuation: ‚Ä¢ Exam route simulator ‚Ä¢ Psychological preparation 'The inspector is human too' ‚Ä¢ Parallel parking (better open your eyes) ‚Ä¢ Good luck mantra from the director
exam_prep.offer_text: Study in your pajamas! Our courses are for those who want to learn traffic rules with a cat and a cup of tea. Forget about boring lectures! Includes: ‚Ä¢ Interactive lessons ‚Ä¢ Tests without the desire to jump out the window ‚Ä¢ Animated road situations ‚Ä¢ 24/7 access
exam_prep.limit_text: Overtake everyone on the road to your license!

category_a.subtitle: Category A is your opportunity to become a master of motorcycle control üèÅ. Enjoy speed, maneuverability and unforgettable emotions üåü.

first_aid.title: üöë First aid courses ‚Äì an important step towards your safety!
first_aid.subtitle: In our driving school, you will learn skills that will help you respond correctly in emergency situations on the road and save lives.
first_aid.main_text: ‚ú® Why is this important? üíî Help before the ambulance arrives can save a life. üß† You will learn to act in accidents, injuries and other critical cases. üéì A certificate of completing the courses is required for taking the exam.
first_aid.main_text_continuation: üìö Theory and practice: real scenarios and working with mannequins. ü©∫ Basic skills: resuscitation, stopping bleeding, and shock assistance.
first_aid.offer_title: üî• Register today and become a confident driver! üö¶
first_aid.why_text: Help before the ambulance arrives can save a life. You will learn to act in accidents, injuries and other critical cases. A certificate of completing the courses is required for taking the exam.

final_course.title: üèÅ The final stage on the way to your permanent license ‚Äì get ready for victory!
final_course.subtitle: The final training course, winter driving ‚Äì this is your last push towards successfully passing the exams for category A or B. We will do everything to make you feel confident and ready for any challenges on the road.

reaction.title: Success Story
reaction.subtitle: Real story from our student
reaction.story: "I've always dreamed of a motorcycle, but was afraid to start training. Viktorija instructors helped me overcome my fear and in just 4 weeks I got my Category A license. Now I'm free!"
reaction.author: ‚Äî Martin, 28 years old
reaction.story_b: "I got my Category B license in just 5 weeks! The instructors were patient and professional. Now I can drive to work in my own car. Thanks Viktorija!"
reaction.story_final: "The ARK exam was scary for me, but Viktorija's preparation helped me pass it successfully. Now I have a permanent license!"
reaction.story_medical: "The first aid courses were very useful. Now I feel safer on the road and know what to do in an emergency."

focused.title: Detailed Information
focused.subtitle: Answers to important questions for decision making

faq1.q: How long does the training take?
faq1.a: Training takes 4-5 weeks, including theory (28 hours), practice (28 hours) and first aid courses (16 hours).

faq2.a: Yes, we offer the possibility of payment in installments. Contact us to clarify the conditions.

faq3.q: What is included in the course price?
faq3.a: The price includes: theory (28 hours), practice (28 hours), first aid courses (16 hours), driving courses on slippery roads and in the dark.

faq4.q: What is the exam pass rate?
faq4.a: 98% of our students pass the exam on the first try thanks to quality preparation and experienced instructors.

system1.title: ‚ö° Quick decision? Choose in 30 seconds!

system2.consideration3: Learning time is the same: 4-5 weeks
system2.warning1: With manual license you cannot drive automatic
system2.warning2: With automatic license you can drive both types

painpoints.subtitle: Once you learn to park with our instructors, parallel parking will no longer be your nightmare, but your morning warm-up.

a.title: üèçÔ∏è Category A ‚Äî When Two Pedals are Already Too Many!
a.description: Includes theoretical lessons on how to look cool in any situation. Perfect for those planning to carry passengers who will pretend they're not scared at all.
a.button: The Road Awaits Heroes ‚Äî Become One!

b.title: üöó Category B. For Those Who Are Tired of Telling the Driver "Wrong Way!"
b.description: The most popular category for ordinary mortals! You'll learn that yellow at a traffic light is not a signal to "go faster!" (includes free philosophy lessons at traffic lights when you stall).
b.button: Shift to Dream Speed ‚Äî Start Now!

c.title: üéì Final Course. The Last Dash to Your Dream License!
c.description: The home stretch to becoming "A Person with a License"! Individual lessons with instructors who will patiently explain for the 10th time that a roundabout is not a place to express creativity.

instructors.title: Our Experienced Instructors
instructors.subtitle: Professional team with many years of teaching experience

team.title: OUR TEAM: PEOPLE WHO LOVE THEIR WORK
team.subtitle: For more than 15 years, we've been turning uncertain pedestrians into confident drivers. During this time, our graduates have put so many kilometers on their car wheels that they could have reached the Moon and back... several times!
team.main_text: Our driving school employs not just instructors, but true steering wheel wizards.
team.instructor_description: ‚Äî head and founder of the school, a legendary figure, theory guru, knows traffic rules better than his own home address. A driving instructor whose patience could be entered in the Guinness Book of Records. Even if you stall ten times in a row at a traffic light, he'll just smile and say: Let's try an eleventh time!
team.why_title: WHY US? BECAUSE WE ARE THE BEST!
team.testimonial: They truly care about each student here. My instructor Andrei took all my fears into account and helped me overcome them. Now I drive with such pleasure, as if I've been behind the wheel all my life! ‚Äî Katrin, 34 years old
team.button: Maneuver towards your dream ‚Äî sign up for a course! ‚Üí
team.limit_text: We don't have teaching templates because each student is unique. Some are afraid of speed, some of turns, and some simply can't remember where the turn signal is. And that's normal!

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our driving school
faq.question1: How long does it take to get a license?
faq.answer1: The time it takes to get a license varies depending on the category and your learning pace. On average, it takes 1-3 months for Category B.
faq.question2: How many driving lessons will I need?
faq.answer2: The number of lessons depends on your previous experience and how quickly you learn. Most students need 20-30 hours for Category B.
faq.question3: What documents do I need to start learning?
faq.answer3: You'll need your ID, a medical certificate, and a passport photo. We'll help you with the paperwork.
faq.question4: When do I pay for the lessons?
faq.answer4: You can pay for the full course upfront with a discount, or pay in installments as you progress.
faq.question5: Can I take lessons in the evening or on weekends?
faq.answer5: Yes, we offer flexible scheduling including evenings and weekends to accommodate your busy schedule.
faq.question6: What if I fail my exam?
faq.answer6: If you fail your exam, we offer additional support and practice before you retake it. We're committed to your success.
